text: Nia king gaa hai be nia damana ni oou, gei nia queen gaa hai be nia dinana. Digaula ga dogoduli gi lala i oo mua ga hagalaamua goe. Digaula ga haga modongoohia nadau hila gi lala i nadau hagalaamua goe, gei goe ga iloo bolo Au dela go Dimaadua, ge tangada dela ma ga hagadagadagagee mai gi di Au, ga hagalee loo e manawa gee.”
